p: The EEMLR and EEQGL showed mortality as in bioassay which implies the biological activity of the chemical substance in the extract. It was found that highly cytotoxic with LC 50 values 3.49, 5.97 μg/ml of EEMLR and EEQGL in brine shrimp lethality bioassay suggest prevention of cancer cell proliferation. This result was exposed for the presence of alkaloids, flavonoid group ( Howlader et al., 2012).
